registryKey.description: Generate file with runtime module descriptors for IntelliJ project
Generate assertions for @RequiresEdt and similar annotations. The assertions are added by instrumenting class files during compilation.
Generate line numbers when instrumenting @RequiresEdt and similar annotations. This results in better stack traces when generated assertions throw exceptions, but might slow down the compilation.
Enables commit messages validation for kotlin plugin
Enables commit messages validation for intellij project
